h2.span: Home of the Tigers in White River SD

p.span: Welcome to the White River School district site. Here you can view all the news, views and who's who for the White River School District 47-1, the High School, MiddleSchool, Elementary and Norris Elementary.

The community of White River, its students, parents, teachers, administrators and Board of Education have the responsibility to prepare our students for a productive role in society. Learning should be a continuous process for our students, including opportunities for learning basic academic and technological skills and exploring general, vocational, and extracurricular areas of interest.
A letter from the Office of the Superintendent.
Stop Germs! Wash Your Hands; When and How

div.p: Click the link to find out more about our school's report card.

The Parent/Student Portal is your resource for keeping up to date with everything that is going on with your student. Assignments, attendance records, and the school calendar can all be viewed with your Portal account.
Please check out the Sport Schedule page to see all the dates your favorite sporting events are taking place.

div.title: Teacher Writing a Formula on a Blackboard

em.u: Begin a Career at White River Schools

div.p: The White River School District 47-1 Board of Education is seeking applications for the following positions. Please click here for more information.
